resources.string: Enter your email address to reset password
Q1. One of the main challenges in NLP is
You have successfully completed the Quiz!
Tech Intellect is a technical quiz application that tests the users on some interesting topics like Natural Language Processing, Computer Science Acronyms, R Programming, and Google go.
How to sign in to the application?
You can sign in to the application using the registered email address and password. Users can also use the app by signing in as a guest.
How to choose the topic and difficulty level?

Tech Intellect allows users to choose their level of expertise.This can be done by signing into the app and navigating to the home screen. The home screen let the users choose their topic, difficulty level, and the mode of the quiz.
What are timed and endless modes?

The application delivers the quiz to users in two different modes, namely Timed and Endless. Timed mode forces the users to finish the quiz within a stipulated time depending on the difficulty level and Endless mode allows the users to take the quiz and learn on their own pace.
What is the use of dashboard?

The dashboard allows the users to revisit their past learning history. Once a quiz is successfully completed, the corresponding quiz will be created dynamically under the dashboard tab. On clicking it, users can go through the questions and answers that was asked in the quiz. Note that this feature is not available for guest users.
What if I forget my password?
Registered users can reset their password using the forgot password screen. The users would be notified by an email for resetting the password.
How to control the vibration and buzzer sound?
Both vibration and buzzer sound features can be turned on/off under the settings menu.
For further queries, please feel free to reach us at:
Buzzer sound for right and wrong answer
